queries.name: test
queries.query: SELECT primary_id, 'Lars' as name, '20150101' AS observationDate FROM apps /* WHERE primary_id=%(primary_id)s */

queries.name: slowtest
queries.query: SELECT primary_id, RANDOM() AS random, '20150101' AS observationDate, 'Lars' as name FROM apps /* WHERE primary_id=%(primary_id)s */
